QuestData.Title: Cleaning Up the Pools
QuestData.Description: <A single tear rolls down the face of Iron Eyes.>$B$BI have heard that you are heading back into the pools to the west. I have something for you to do while you are out there, $r.$B$BThe gnomes, who care nothing for the land, have polluted it with their machinery. I want you to pick up any spare parts that you come across.$B$BReturn them to me here. I will see to it that they are properly disposed of before we leave this place for good.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect 15 Fizzcrank Spare Parts and deliver them to Iron Eyes at Taunka'le Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: If we do not take care of the land, she will not suffer us to live for long.
QuestData.RewardText: It is the taunka way to leave the land pristine before we move on.$B$BWe will be traveling to our capital, Icemist, very soon. You have helped by allowing us to depart that much more quickly.$B$BThank you.
